SquidDOT & SQTR Management Authority

Making the best roads ever for Melanie City, Alee Isle, Lion Land, and beyond

News & Travel Information

Ongoing

5/17/2021 -- Freeway 20/WHS A3 closed between Whale City and Melanie City
Due to widening works, Freeway 20/WHS A3 is closed between Whale City and Melanie City. Detour using Highway/Freeway 49 north and A4 towards Whale City.

Future

Freeway 20 widening between Whale City and Westover
To keep up with increasing population growth in the Whale City and Melanie City areas, we are widening Freeway 20 through downtown Melanie City.

Doodly Bridge reconstruction
To improve access to the new MSI airport, we are expanding the Doodly Bridge and plan to make it infinitely nicer than ever before.

(Non serious) Website created for bnbmc1.2 - see aircs.racing!
